```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, descr) {

    command_start <- "\\cvevent"
    tbl[[where]] <- gsub("\n", " \\\\newline ", tbl[[where]])
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[when]], "}", 
        "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[where]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[descr]], "}"
        )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}

cvproj <- function(tbl,what,role,items){
    command_start <- "\\cvproj"
    res <- paste0(
        command_start, "{", tbl[[what]], "}",
        "{", tbl[[role]], "}",
        "{", sapply(tbl[[items]], function(x)paste0(x,collapse = ", ")), "}"
    )

    cat(res, sep = "\n\n\n")
}
```

### Summary

PhD student at LMU Munich focused on LLM inference optimization and GPU performance engineering.
Active open-source contributor to vLLM, with merged contributions to speculative decoding.
Previously a software engineer at Allianz and ML intern at Amazon.
Seeking an internship to help optimize inference and training systems at scale.
